scripts.install:all: yarn && cd ./server && yarn && cd ../authenticationService && yarn && cd ../client && yarn
scripts.pre-push: cd ./server && yarn run pre-push && cd ../authenticationService && yarn run pre-push && cd ../client && yarn run pre-push
scripts.pre-commit: cd ./server && yarn run pre-commit && cd ../authenticationService && yarn run pre-commit && cd ../client && yarn run pre-commit
scripts.format:check: cd ./server && yarn run format:check && cd ../authenticationService && yarn run format:check && cd ../client && yarn run format:check
scripts.format:fix: cd ./server && yarn run format:fix && cd ../authenticationService && yarn run format:fix && cd ../client && yarn run format:fix
